entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:31 PM PDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries near the Coastal mountains. Amount 4 cm near the Coastal mountains. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 12:31 PM PDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.
